titles: Obsequies offer'd up to the dear and never-dying memorie of the honorable Sr Paul Pindar Kt.
author: P. F.
notes: Verse - "Hence all unhallowed orgies; let no tongue".
Annotation on Thomason copy: [barely legible] "7tbr [i.e. September] 1650".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Pindar, Paul, --  Sir, 1565 or 6-1650 --  Poetry --  Early works to 1800.
